characterDescription:
Eshava is a young lighteyed Alethi woman who is from Highprince Aladar's warcamp. She is an acquaintance of Adolin Kholin and a friend to Torol.
Eshava accompanies Torol on an afternoon when Adolin meets with him, and a group of other young lighteyes at an Outer Market wineshop. This group includes Jakamav and Danlan.
Eshava believes that Dalinar's imposed restrictions on his soldiers are foolish. She wishes that he would step down from his position.
